Introduction

Kang Seung Sik is a South Korean singer. He is the current leader of the boy group VICTON.

He debuted as a member of VICTON on November 9, 2016, with the group's first mini album Voice To New World.

On December 17, 2024, IST Entertainment announced that Kang Seung Sik would be leaving the company ahead of the expiration of his exclusive contract.
